item.title: [dmc] Hero of Precinct One
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.

item.title: [dmc] Generous Gift
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

item.title: [dmc] Zetalpa, Primal Dawn
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elder Dinosaur

Flying, double strike, vigilance, trample, indestructible

item.title: [dmc] Urza's Ruinous Blast
item.description:
Legendary Sorcery

(You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)

Exile all nonland permanents that aren't legendary.

item.title: [dmc] Unbreakable Formation
item.description:
Instant

Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures and they gain vigilance until end of turn.

item.title: [dmc] Echoing Truth
item.description:
Instant

Return target nonland permanent and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent to their owners' hands.

item.title: [dmc] Drana, Liberator of Malakir
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Ally

Flying, first strike

Whenever Drana, Liberator of Malakir deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on each attacking creature you control.

item.title: [dmc] Ambition's Cost
item.description:
Sorcery

You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

item.title: [dmc] Kothophed, Soul Hoarder
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Demon

Flying

Whenever a permanent owned by another player is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

item.title: [dmc] Josu Vess, Lich Knight
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Zombie Knight

Kicker {5}{B} (You may pay an additional {5}{B} as you cast this spell.)

Menace

When Josu Vess, Lich Knight enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create eight 2/2 black Zombie Knight creature tokens with menace.

item.title: [dmc] Hero's Downfall
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

item.title: [dmc] Read the Bones
item.description:
Sorcery

Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life.

item.title: [dmc] Painful Truths
item.description:
Sorcery

Converge — You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast this spell.

item.title: [dmc] Night's Whisper
item.description:
Sorcery

You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

item.title: [dmu] Thran Portal
item.description:
Land — Gate

Thran Portal enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands.

Thran Portal is the chosen type in addition to its other types.

Mana abilities of Thran Portal cost an additional 1 life to activate.

item.title: [dmu] The Weatherseed Treaty
item.description:
Enchantment — Saga

Read ahead (Choose a chapter and start with that many lore counters. Add one after your draw step. Skipped chapters don't trigger. Sacrifice after III.)

I — Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

II — Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

III — Domain — Target creature you control gets +X/+X and gains trample until end of turn, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

https://twitter.com/coL_AliasV/status/1562497174591512576

item.title: [dmu] "Love Song of Night and Day"
item.description:
Enchantment — Saga

Read ahead (Choose a chapter and start with that many lore counters. Add one after your draw step. Skipped chapters don't trigger. Sacrifice after III.)

I — You and target opponent each draw two cards.

II — Create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.

III —- Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.

https://twitter.com/ElBadiablo/status/1562504547570188288

item.title: [dmu] The Elder Dragon War
item.description:
Enchantment — Saga

Read ahead (Choose a chapter and start with that many lore counters. Add one after your draw step. Skipped chapters don't trigger. Sacrifice after III.)

I — The Elder Dragon War deals 2 damage to each creature and each opponent.

II — Discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards.

III — Create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.

https://twitter.com/MTG_Arena/status/1562520537464995841

item.title: [dmu] Shield-Wall Sentinel
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

Defender

When Shield-Wall Sentinel enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with defender, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [dmu] "Braids's Nightmarish Return"
item.description:
Enchantment — Saga

Read ahead (Choose a chapter and start with that many lore counters. Add one after your draw step. Skipped chapters don't trigger. Sacrifice after III.)

I — You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, each opponent discards a card.

II — Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

III — Target opponent may sacrifice a nonland, nontoken permanent. If they don't, they lose 2 life and you draw a card.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4Zk39QvDt48

item.title: [dmu] Defiler of Flesh
item.description:
Creature — Phyrexian Horror

Menace

As an additional cost to cast black permanent spells, you may pay 2 life. Those spells cost {B} less to cast if you paid life this way. This effect reduces only the amount of black mana you pay.

Whenever you cast a black permanent spell, target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains menace until end of turn.
